Name: Quiver Cartridge
Desc: Uses special Arrow Head. When obtaining Advanced Quiver, additional Arrow Head and replacement Arrow Head are available.

H.Old: Fires a magical Arrow that chases and attacks enemies with the 30% chance of 220%.
H.New: A 30% chance of firing a magic arrow that attacks enemies at 220% Damage.

h1.Old: Fires a magical Arrow that chases and attacks enemies with the 30% chance of 220%.
h1.New: A 30% chance of firing a magic arrow that attacks enemies at 220% Damage.

HFields.h1: A 30% chance of firing a magic arrow that attacks enemies at 220% Damage.
